metadata.name: Kochuu #01
metadata.description:
#01 of the Kochuu Series

The animation series titled "Kochuu 壺中", presents my personal take on the Japanese phrase Kochuu, which translates into “inside a vase” or “expressing a sense of otherworldliness”. Much of the art process involves using human figure to give abstract-mathematical shapes a sense of scale and realism.

Art by: Kochuu
Music by: nahncenz

3250x1838 pixel
